data.text: Augustus rengpa'n Rome ramsuungseng milu teelnasik-ah chong aleipeii phakhan,
Quirinius in Syria wairoon suungnga hiwahi ma-insakhet milukateel kha a-eii.
Mirakip in inmani inmani khuopui suungnga inraming kapeluut inleisi.
Joseph um Galilee inti Nazareth khopui makheiya Bethlehem tia inkoi David khopui Judea ramsuungnga aleisi, ajarchu ama kha David phungrui e-jarra eii.
Ama numei ka-esik naikawon Mary khale raming kapeluut inleisi,
halli inmani'n Bethlehemma inleiom phakhan, nainei nasik pha alei ejei.
Mary in sapasal ma-insakhet aleinei, khale inruoiya puonna leikasuunna, sarakuong suungkhan aleiminzaal, ajarchu inmani'n omnasik innkha leiommak.
Khawa phakhan keelngam kakhaalngai kha, keelngam khaalna munna keelngam kha zaalsoot inngaak ah inleiom.
Pumi marwaan tirton kha inmani diang aleiinlar, han Pumi poinakha inmani diang aleiminmu, halli inmani kha kachi'n aleisip.
Marwaan tirton in inmani diang aleiti, “Chimaru! Kei'n mirakip roknasik chong kahoikha nangnidiang kajuochoi.
Awini nikhuohin Kanasanpa Christa Pumi kha David khopuiya inneijei.
Hiwahi nangnisik-ah jetna eii; nangni'n naiteii kha puonna kasuun inta sarakuongnga inleiminzaal kha ningjuomusik eii.”
Jetlei theileiya tirton khale marwaan raalmi tirton katamtak in Pathian minpaakna laa injuosak;
“Marwaan insaangnakhet khan Pathian lurlian nakha omrase,
Tirton ngai'n marwaan tiang inleikir phakhan, keelngam kakhaal ngai'n khatli khatdiang inlei inti, “Pumi'n einidiang ileiti ngaihi, Bethlehemma juosi inlang angrakip kasuok ngaikha juoenrui.”
Khale inruoiya inmani'n innottheiya insiya mary li Joseph kha injuomu halli naiteii kha-um sarakuongnga inminzaalla inleidakha injuomu.
Inmani'n neiteii kha injuomu phakhan, Tirton kha'n naiteii jarra ileiril rakipkha inmani diang inleirilpi.
Keelngam kakhaal ngai'n inril chong kajet mi rakip in ngakna inleinei.
Mary in inmani'n inleiril chong rakip ngaikha kathatak ah amalung suungnga aleingaidonrep.
Keelngam kakhaal ngai'n inleikirra inmani diang Pathian tirton in ileirilpijek kha injuomu injuojet jarra Pathian kha inminlur inminlianna inleiminpaak.
Wuntan nasik niriat honghuui phakhan, marwaan tirton in ama kha inwonma ah araming inleiphuopi angnga, aramingkha Jisu inleitijei. Levi 12:3; Luk 1:31
Moses Dan chongpei dungjuiya Joseph li Mary in naiteii kha minthiang nasikpha ahongtungjei. Khawale inruoiya naiteii kha Pumi diang peluutnasik-ah Jerusalemma inleichoi, 2:22-24; Levi 12:6-8
Pumi Dan khan hinthoa leiinjia angnga, “Pasan ma-insakhet ah innei rakipchu Pumi diang minthiangnasik-ah inpeluutsik eii.” Suok 13:2,12
Halli Pumi Dan khan areiom iti dungjuiya, “Wathu inni, emakli pharbaliteii inni kha penasik-ah inleichoi.” Levi 12:6-8

Jerusalem ma miring inkhat araming Simeon inti aleiom, ama kha kadik khat um Pathian kachi mi alei eii, halli Israel ngai sanminringna kamusik-ah kangaak chak ah kaom mi kha-um aleieii. Ratha Inthiang khan amadiang alei-inruoipui
halli Pumi chong inkhitna ah ipei Messiah kha namumaklaiseng thinutin tia amadiang inngamna-um aleipeii.
Simeon kha Ratha in inruoipuiya biak-inna aleiluut. Dan dungjuiya anuli apa'n naiteii Jisu kha biak-inna inleiruoi phakhan,
Simeon in naiteii kha akut-ah pomma Pathian leiminpaak ah ati:
“Pumi atuun chu, nang chong inkhitnakha namintungjei,
Nang Sanminringna kha kamit tak-ah kamujei.
Nang in mipui maikuungnga nileimisuukpikha.
Hiwa war in zaatlop ngaidiang nalungdou minmunasik,
Simeon in naiteii jarra irilpi chong rakip kha anu li apa'n aleijet phakhan inleingak.

Halli Simeon in inmani diang rawaan aleipeiya Mary diang aleiti, “ Hiwa naiteii hi Israel ngaidiang insuina khat um sanminringna angjet kapesik-ah Pathian in ikadang ejei. Ama'n Pathian injettheina eta miring angjet in enhal-inta inrilsesik eii,
halli inthup ah kaom inmani ngaidonna ngaikha malarsik eii. Halli malung kasekha chemlujumma innasun angnga namalungkha asunkhoisik eii.”
Pathian chong kachoi numeisa araming Anna inti Phanuel sanu Asher zaat makheiya inkhat aleiom, ama kha upa lei ejei halli inn aneiya aruotharle kumsari bit aleiom,

halli ama'n kumsoomriat leimili katung chuulmei inkhat eya aleiom,2:37. Halli ama'n kumsoomriat leimili katung chuulmei inkhat eya aleiom, emakli kumsoomriat leimili chuulmei inkhat eya aleiom.  halli ama'n biak-inn kha leimathaan lekleiya suunli zaan Pathian chubei thoa bu ngeiya Pathian niya aleiom.
Khawapha takkhan numeisanu kha-um heitungnga Pathian leiminpaak ah Jerusalem katannasik-ah Pathian kangak mi ngaidiang naiteii jarra aleirilpi.
Josheph li Mary in Pumi Dan dungjuiya angrakip thodan kasuok ngaikha inminhek ah Galilee ramsuungnga kaom inmani khopui Nazareth ah inleikirjei. Matt 2:23
Naiteii kha ahong in-soonna ahongngarjei; singnatheina'n leisip ah Pathian rawaan kha amadiang aleiom.
Kumsuoa Jisu nuli apa kha Jerusalemma rakaanna kahoi inchelsik-ah inleisi. Suok 12:1-27; Innidan 16:1-18
Jisu kha kum soomleini ahong ephakhan a-ngai angnga inmani'n Jerusalemma rakaanna kahoi inchel inleisi.
Kahoi kha hakli inmani'n inntiang inleikir phakhan, Jisu'n Jerusalemma aleiom, anuli apa inchu leijetmu.
Inmani karra inchel tia suunsoot lamkhan inleisi, halli inmani'n Jisu kha insuungkhur ngaili insappui ngai karra kaentok inleiphut,
Inmani'n Jisu kha leimumu, khale inruoiya inmani'n Jerusalem tiang inkirra ama ka-entok inleisi.
Nithum suoa ama kha biak-inna Jihudi karu ngaile in-ongnga inmani chongkha rangaiya halli inmani diang chong rakella ileiomkha injuomu.
Ama'n kasing kathei tak ah imasangli irakelngai kajet rakip in inleingak.
Anuli apa'n injuomu phakhan ngakna inleinei halli anu'n amadiang ati, “Sapa, angsik ah nang in keinidiang hin ninathome? Napa li kei'n malung kapoong tak ah nangkha kinnaentok eii.”
Halli Ama'n inmani diang heimasang, “Angsik-ah nangni'n kei ningna entokme? kei'n Kapa inna kaomsik tihi nangni'n jetmak chuwabe?”
Halli ama irilpi kha inmani'n leijet matormu.
Khale inruoiya Jisu'n chongjuina aleineiya inmanile Nazareth tiang inleikir, halli anu'n akasuok choun rakip kha amalung suungnga aleida.
Jisu'n singna theinali taksa ah hong insoonna, Pathian khat-um mipui ngai minriang nakha alei inkheel. 1 Sam 2:26; Chongil 3:4
